name: Simon Peter (Cephas)
blurb: First among equals—confessor and denier, restored to lead. Keys of the kingdom signify teaching/judicial authority under Christ.
searchText: simon peter (cephas) person apostle first among equals—confessor and denier, restored to lead. keys of the kingdom signify teaching/judicial authority under christ.

name: Noah
blurb: Noah ‘walked with God’ in a corrupt generation. Obedient to God’s word, he builds the ark and becomes the instrument of preservation through the Flood. Afterward, God covenants never again to destroy
searchText: noah person narrative noah ‘walked with god’ in a corrupt generation. obedient to god’s word, he builds the ark and becomes the instrument of preservation through the flood. afterward, god covenants never again to destroy the earth with water, giving the rainbow as a sign. jewish tradition debates whether noah’s righteousness was relative or absolute; christian readers see in him a type of christ—obedient, saving his household. p.noah.daughter-of-zelophehad--9d853482

name: Balaam son of Beor
blurb: Diviner who speaks true oracles under constraint yet later counsels seduction—tragic ambiguity.
